From: Chalhoub University <Chalhoub.University@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-01-21 14:20
Subject: Unlock Your Potential with Chalhoub University
--------------------------------------------------
 



 

Dear Hagop,

At Chalhoub Group, we believe that growth is not just a destination, but a continuous journey of exploration and amazement. We have noticed that, in 2024, you have not explored much the incredible opportunities available at Chalhoub University <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchalhoubuniversity.com%2Fcourse%2Fview.php%3Fid%3D3339%26section%3D2&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cc8921767c23f4b2460c208dd3a05283e%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638730516040925884%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=0rcD8k6JYkFFX1iuNQ7WJEEHH%2FUIpfvyC56Eaevarrk%3D&reserved=0> ; therefore, we are excited to reintroduce you to the transformative learning experiences awaiting you there.

Whether you are refining your expertise or exploring new frontiers, Chalhoub University offers a powerful range of courses that will propel you toward your goals and help you achieve greatness.
